item.title: Continously updated communications with state and local law enforcement in the United States
item.description: TABLE OF CONTENTS California Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office Florida California Los Angeles (id=“municipality-of-los-angeles”) Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office Email sent to the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office on April 4, 2024, at 21:00 (+0800 China Standard Time) Email replay from the Los Angeles County District Attorney’s Office on April 4, 2024, at 21:00 (+0800 China Standard Time) Florida Return to the Table of Contents ↩︎ To gain a clearer understanding of the sequence of events in this case, I invite you to view a detailed timeline at the following link:
